TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kyu’ang, title = Kyu’ang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kyu’ang} }

S.FORM: Kyu'ang Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Kyu'ang a niyaro', 20 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 40 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat 75%, Tayal 15%.

Kyo'ang Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Kyo'ang a niyaro', 20 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 40 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat 75%, Tayal 15%.
